Title: Permits the Church of Jesus Christ (Apostolic), Inc. to file an application for a real property tax exemption
Summary: Permits the Church of Jesus Christ (Apostolic), Inc., located at 332-340 South Columbus Avenue in the city of Mount Vernon, to file an application for a real property tax exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to permitting the Church of Jesus Christ (Apostolic), Inc. to file an application for a real property tax exemption
